sqlMap.select: SELECT b.no, b.title, b.content, TO_CHAR (b.reg_date, 'YY-MM-DD HH12:MI') AS reg_date, b.VIEW_COUNT, b.user_no, b.user_name, (SELECT COUNT (*) AS CNT FROM reply WHERE B.NO = reply.BOARD_NO) reply_count FROM BOARD_COMMUNITY B WHERE b.title LIKE '%' || #kwd# || '%' OR content LIKE '%' || #kwd# || '%' ORDER BY no DESC
SELECT B.NO, B.TITLE, B.REG_DATE, B.USER_NO, B.USER_NAME, b.VIEW_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT (*) AS CNT FROM reply WHERE B.NO = reply.BOARD_NO) reply_count FROM BOARD_COMMUNITY B order by B.no desc
SELECT NO, TITLE, CONTENT, REG_DATE, VIEW_COUNT, USER_NO, USER_NAME, (SELECT COUNT (*) AS CNT FROM reply WHERE B.NO = reply.BOARD_NO) reply_count FROM BOARD_COMMUNITY B WHERE no = #no#
sqlMap.insert: insert into BOARD_COMMUNITY (NO, TITLE, CONTENT, user_NO, user_NAME, REG_DATE) VALUES (SEQ_BOARD_COMMUNITY.nextval, #title# , #content#, #userNo#, #userName#, sysdate)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE BOARD_COMMUNITY SET VIEW_COUNT=VIEW_COUNT+1 where no=#no#
UPDATE BOARD_COMMUNITY SET title = #title#, content = #content# WHERE no = #no#
